facade

Class AdminFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.AdminFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class AdminFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    This class is Administrator business-layer level that uses for speaking with administrator credentials with DAO-layer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrey Orlov
